title: In the Winter Dark
description: Night falls. In a lonely valley called the Sink, four people prepare for a quiet evening. Then in his orchard, Murray Jaccob sees a moving shadow. Across the swamp, his neighbour Ronnie watches her lover leave and feels her baby roll inside her. And on the veranda of the Stubbses house, a small dog is torn screaming from its leash by something unseen. Nothing will ever be the same again.
author: Tim Winton
